response.overview: A visually vibrant and emotionally charged journey of identity and self-discovery, set in the heart of Mexico City. A troubled young man, lost in a sexual identity crisis, seeks guidance from a tarot reader who sparks a path toward self-acceptance. Drawn into the raw energy of a local cantina, he becomes enamored with a charismatic bartender. Fueled by doubt and tequila, reality blurs into magical realism as he takes the stage to bare his heart through song. In a tender, hopeful finale, the two leave together—hinting at newfound confidence, connection, and the possibility of love.
response.title: Polanco
